name: Space Horror
description:
Sugestões e feedbacks: https://forms.gle/Jv9dMeywVaPSLi9f7

This is an early protoype of my horror-survival game. 

Synopsis:

You are locked in a remote base in the lost continent of Vandary. There an arquealogical team finds a strange creature, dead long ago. Or that was what they thought. 

Now you are trying to escape the facility and you have to discover the password

Commands: 

  • A/D ---> Move left and right (Mover para a esquerda e direita)
  • Space ---> Shoot (Atirar)
